name: .PGX File Extension
summary: Learn about .PGX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Hopedot VOS, a thin virtualization client used for running Windows programs from an external USB device; saves all applications and files on an external drive partition and encrypts them so that they cannot be accessed without valid login information.

content: When installing Hopedot VOS, you must first specify a portable drive that stores the Windows applications and files. Hopedot VOS then creates a PGX file on the drive to store the data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
